entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gull Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:12 PM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Monday 30 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
